name: DefaultReserveInterestRateStrategy
description: DefaultReserveInterestRateStrategy contract. The model of interest rate is based on 2 slopes, one before the `OPTIMAL_UTILIZATION_RATE` point of utilization and another from that one to 100% - An instance of this same contract, can't be used across different Aave markets, due to the caching of the LendingPoolAddressesProvider. Implements the calculation of the interest rates depending on the reserve state.

functionDecorators.name: calculateInterestRates
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the interest rates depending on the reserve's state and configurations.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidityAdded
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidity added during the operation.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidityTaken
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidity taken during the operation.

parameterDecorators.name: totalStableDebt
parameterDecorators.description: The total borrowed from the reserve a stable rate.

parameterDecorators.name: totalVariableDebt
parameterDecorators.description: The total borrowed from the reserve at a variable rate.

parameterDecorators.name: averageStableBorrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: The weighted average of all the stable rate loans.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The reserve portion of the interest that goes to the treasury of the market.

functionDecorators.name: calculateInterestRates
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the interest rates depending on the reserve's state and configurations. NOTE This function is kept for compatibility with the previous DefaultInterestRateStrategy interface. New protocol implementation uses the new calculateInterestRates() interface.

parameterDecorators.name: availableLiquidity
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidity available in the corresponding aToken.

parameterDecorators.name: totalStableDebt
parameterDecorators.description: The total borrowed from the reserve a stable rate.

parameterDecorators.name: totalVariableDebt
parameterDecorators.description: The total borrowed from the reserve at a variable rate.

parameterDecorators.name: averageStableBorrowRate
parameterDecorators.description: The weighted average of all the stable rate loans.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The reserve portion of the interest that goes to the treasury of the market.
